content: 📢 If the price ticker is not loading,please update the link: if the price ticker is not loading then update the link  approx 650$ + Shipping (WORLDWIDE - The cost is around $160-170 with insurance, EU $60-80 with insurance)^^^^^^^^^^^^Available also in size approx. 30x45 cm(Only on very special occasions will I take them with me to conferences. There will be around 1-3 pieces in this size,which makes the larger ones even more unique.)if the price ticker is not loading then update the link  approx 135$ + Shipping (Packaging is included at no extra cost. WORLDWIDE - The cost is around $20 without insurance, up to $40 with insurance, EU - $18 (including insurance))🎨 Technique: Experience the fusion of digital art and mixed media.Limited-edition poster with a sleek black wooden frame,size 75.1 x 105.1 cm (30 x 41 inches).It's printed on Hahnemühle Print© paper, "Made in Germany" since 1584.🛒 Available Art Pieces:1.SOLD2.SOLD3.LOTTERY: (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5469803.0) CLOSED4.Located in London, UK 🇬🇧 Available5.Located in London, UK 🇬🇧 Available6. AVAILABLE in the size approx. 30x45cm7. Available8. Available9. Available10. Available11.SOLD12. Available💰 Payment Address:3CDxDhHppj1Vyjfb771WjUNiS28UvR5EZyLightning: nastyrisk78@walletofsatoshi.com📱✨ Additionally, don't forget to open the Artivive app! When you point your camera at the artwork, you'll unlock a mesmerizing augmented reality layer that adds a whole new dimension to the experience. Simply magical! 🌟🖼️📷video:(https://streamable.com/21v4pk)🗽 "GOVERNMENT, THE NEGATION OF LIBERTY!" 🗽Year 2019 Limited Edition of 12 Visionaries like Ludwig Von Mises foresaw today's government and its impact on liberty.Many are awakening to this reality, taking steps toward true freedom.Satoshi's creation, Bitcoin, blazes a trail towards eradicating oppressive systems and cleansing the world of their chains.It's a monumental step toward universal emancipation, a call for humanity to unite in the fight for freedom. 💪🌍🪙Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: This artwork has very large size that’s why shipping isn’t cheap but artwork in that size, just amazing. Will update Augmented Reality layer ASAP - animation already good to go.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hi, numbers 4 and 5 BTC will be this month in London on August 22-23 at the private gallery of mx12art.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Voilà! ✨ Animation updated with AR magic. To experience it, remember to open the Artivive app and direct your camera toward the physical artwork. Watch the enchanting augmented reality layer come alive right before your eyes! 🚀📱🎨

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: And let’s create one or a couple of smaller ones for this as well ) It looks like this is going to be sold out soon!! By the way, you can scan this artwork, no matter the size, using the ARTIVIVE app. Just open the app and scan the artwork!
